resources.string: Hello World, Welcome to Hot Coffee Cafe!

This App Helps You To Place Your Order. :
 1 - First Fill Your Details in the Registeration Page 
 Option. 
 2 - To Place Order Go To Menu Option.
3 - To Edit Item Go To Order Option. \n 4 - Here You Can Remove Any Item That You \n no Longer Need.
5 - To Find Us Use Maps By Click On \n Locate Cafe Option.
6 - For Details Click On Info Option.

This app provides you with the menu of our Hot Coffee Cafe. So Whenever you go for buying or ordering any beverage, dont worry about making notes because this app is able to take all menu related worries. All you need to do is just make an order note of your choice in this app. In short place the order. So any where you are just place the order and search for our nearest Cafe. Finally you will receive your ordered food from there.
